preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 80 g of manganese(II) sulfide using a digital scale.
2. Measure out 60 g of rubidium sulfate.
3. Measure out 30 g of sulfur.
4. Measure out 50 g of silicon dioxide.
5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing container.
6. Use a pestle and mortar or mechanical mixer to thoroughly mix the powders until homogenous.
